main event: Observers in Lincoln, Nebraska reported seeing a round ball of fire that illuminated their apartment for 30 minutes.
interesting points: The object changed colors, alternating between blue, red, and orange., Witnesses described intense heat and light from the object, which made it hard to observe., The sighting lasted for an extended period, approximately 30 minutes., The case report mentioned no physical evidence was found., The observers were civilian witnesses who detailed their experience in a questionnaire.
witness description: A husband and wife who observed the object together.
